name: StorPool
overview:
StorPool is software for distributed data storage.

StorPool enables businesses to work with their data reliably and efficiently.

StorPool combines the performance and capacity of hard drives from your servers into a single storage pool. Instead of buying a rack of servers and a rack of storage, with StorPool you can use your servers for both functions. It provides higher bandwidth, lower latency and better reliability than traditional storage arrays.

StorPool is awesome:

  1. It scales in capacity and performance with every added server or hard drive.
  2. It works on standard servers alongside applications and virtual machines.
  3. It protects you against silent data corruption.
  4. It has a zero up-front cost and a pay as you grow pricing model.

milestones.description: StorPool was selected to Pitch on Seedcamp Berlin on 15 May 2012!
